text.text_translated:
Old horror movies show a hero in trouble.  
The hero cannot call for help.  
It is hard to call the police.  
Mobile phones make this less real today.  
The movie needs suspense, so the phone does not work.  
The phone may have no coverage at the key moment.  
The phone battery may die when the hero calls.  
Both problems can happen.
